title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 601.1 - Purpose of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 601.1 - Purpose of part

State Regulations

This Part establishes procedures and standards for the
approval and registration of apprenticeship programs and agreements in
furtherance of the public policy of this State as enunciated in section
810
of the Labor Law
to develop sound apprenticeship training standards and to encourage industry
and labor to institute training programs. This Part is intended to ensure that
apprenticeship programs developed and registered in accordance with public
policy are of the highest possible quality in all aspects of on-the-job
training, related and supplemental instruction, and in providing meaningful
employment and relevant training for all apprentices. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
601.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
